groups.name: spring.python.executor.grpc
groups.description: Configuration properties for the gRPC-based Python executor.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.grpc.host
properties.description: Host address of the gRPC Python executor service.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.grpc.port
properties.description: Port number used to connect to the gRPC Python executor service.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.grpc.token
properties.description: Authentication token required for secure gRPC communication.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.grpc.uri
properties.description: Full URI composed from host and port.
